channel.title: Few questions
channel.description:
ok a few questions. 1. i edited the text then i exited out of it and selected save changes but when i loged on it was still saying the old text.
2. How do i edit the chatbar stuff (like it says to go to the website and sign up for membership
3. how do i spawn items
4. How do i add a command i have the code i just dont know how to add it.
im using figmentscapes project czar 4.5
